channel.title: [ Eden ] - { Edgeville Bank PKing, Full Bounty Hunter System, KS rewarding }
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://eden-ps.com/uploads/monthly_2015_12/566345fc5f36f_EdenLogo.png.de2ede2c95dc92d95f582f982ecb2563.png[/img]
[u][b]Play Now[/b][/u] - www.eden-ps.com Forums/Website - www.eden-ps.com
Welcome to Eden. Eden is an oldschool PvP based server. The server is based on PKing, however, our skills and PvM aspects of the game are both stacked with content that will keep you entertained for hours and hours. Our home area is based out of the edgeville bank. However, outside of the bank is a PvP area where you can fight each other in 1v1 battles. We hope for the best in regards of Edens future and I hope that those of you who decide to join our sever enjoy your stay!
[U][B]This weeks Update List[/B][/U]
[CODE]- Home migrated to Edgeville bank. - Npc Spawns adjusted to fit new home. - Most shops moved to ::shops. - ::melee, ::range, ::pure, ::hybrid - auto equip quick commands added. - ::ancients, ::normal, ::lunars - added for quick switching spells. - Outside of Edge bank turned to a PvP zone. - Bounty Hunter added to outside bank PvP. - Emblem upgrading corrected. - Emblem shop modified. - PK Point Exchange shops for Melee, Range, and Mage all adjusted and bulked. - Values of PK Point Exchange shops adjusted. - Switching speed increased. - SQL errors fixed and hosts migrated to our website. - PKP rewards depending on current kill streak. - PvP shouts added. - Auto-Join clan chat. - KDR updating on interface. - Barrage freezing fixed. - Spec alter restore time modified. - More to come.[/CODE]
[U][B]Media[/B][/U] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ca81FDB.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/dDWL0bn.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/tEBKvsZ.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/k9yFpcG.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/UAyqJyz.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ODeGTIL.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/7yVNP4p.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/iSkZoxd.png[/img][/CENTER]

item.description:
@EdenPS wrote:

[CENTER]

Play Now - www.eden-ps.com
Forums/Website - www.eden-ps.com

Welcome to Eden. Eden is an oldschool PvP based server. The server is based on PKing, however, our skills and PvM aspects of the game are both stacked with content that will keep you entertained for hours and hours. Our home area is based out of the edgeville bank. However, outside of the bank is a PvP area where you can fight each other in 1v1 battles. We hope for the best in regards of Edens future and I hope that those of you who decide to join our sever enjoy your stay!

This weeks Update List

[CODE]- Home migrated to Edgeville bank.

  • Npc Spawns adjusted to fit new home.
  • Most shops moved to ::shops.
  • ::melee, ::range, ::pure, ::hybrid - auto equip quick commands added.
  • ::ancients, ::normal, ::lunars - added for quick switching spells.
  • Outside of Edge bank turned to a PvP zone.
  • Bounty Hunter added to outside bank PvP.
  • Emblem upgrading corrected.
  • Emblem shop modified.
  • PK Point Exchange shops for Melee, Range, and Mage all adjusted and bulked.
  • Values of PK Point Exchange shops adjusted.
  • Switching speed increased.
  • SQL errors fixed and hosts migrated to our website.
  • PKP rewards depending on current kill streak.
  • PvP shouts added.
  • Auto-Join clan chat.
  • KDR updating on interface.
  • Barrage freezing fixed.
  • Spec alter restore time modified.
  • More to come.[/CODE]
